details.description:
Dr Maël Primet, 29, is a mathematician, entrepreneur and co-founder of Snips.

He is passionate about data mining and visualisation, having created several tools allowing users to immediately spot patterns in complex datasets, without needing to code.

Maël is Ingénieur du Corps des Mines, holds a PhD in mathematics and computer vision and graduated from the École Normale Supérieure in Paris.
